pages.text: Restaurants Restaurants Gift Cards Reservations Homepage News & Happenings Careers Contact ☰ x Restaurants Restaurants Gift Cards Reservations Homepage News & Happenings Careers Contact Thank you, Veterans | Nov. 11 CentraArchy Restaurants Express Gratitude to Armed Forces – Local restaurants are honoring the hard work and sacrifices of U.S. military with a special discount on Veterans Day. Atlanta (Oct. 2, 2025) At all 15 CentraArchy Restaurants, on Nov. 11, any U.S. veteran or active-duty member of the armed forces with I.D. is invited to enjoy any entrée from the full menu at half price. “We greatly appreciate U.S. veterans and active armed forces personnel for their service to our nation and in the local communities for our restaurants,” said CentraArchy Restaurants CEO Vince Van Brunt. “We invite veterans and active-duty military to enjoy regular menu entrées including fresh seafood, aged steaks and other popular items at half price on Veterans Day, Nov. 11.” Honored guests are encouraged to book reservations online in advance and bring a valid military I.D. or proof of military service to enjoy half-off any entrée from the restaurant’s regular dinner menu. The special half price offer is valid for dine-in only. All CentraArchy Restaurants are participating. For more information and to make a reservation, or call your preferred location. please click here > # # # 15th ANNUAL PINK KISS FOR THE CURE Diners Across Five States Join in Supporting Living Beyond Breast Cancer with the Pink Kiss Martini – For the 15th consecutive year, in recognition of , continues its annual campaign throughout October. Atlanta (Sept. 30, 2025) National Breast Cancer Awareness Month CentraArchy Restaurants “Pink Kiss for the Cure” All CentraArchy Restaurants in five states are offering the limited-edition Pink Kiss martini with 50 percent of the sales going directly to breast cancer research and care. As in 2022 through 2024, this year’s Pink Kiss campaign contributions will go to the national nonprofit , an organization on mission for over 30 years to provide trusted information and a community of support to those impacted by the disease, offering on-demand emotional, practical and evidence-based content that is meaningful to those newly diagnosed, in-treatment, post-treatment and living with metastatic disease. Living Beyond Breast Cancer “In the first 14 years, thousands of our guests generously raised over $275,000 for the Pink Kiss for the Cure campaign,” said . “This is an important tradition for all eight of our restaurant brands at 15 Southeast locations—we hope our 15th year is another tremendous success in support of the great work by the team at Living Beyond Breast Cancer.” CentraArchy CEO Vince Van Brunt To participate, guests simply order the at any CentraArchy Restaurant, including (Augusta, Ga., Charleston, S.C., Columbia, S.C., Greenville, S.C., Spanish Fort, Ala., and Surfside Beach, S.C.), (Myrtle Beach, S.C.), (Greenville, S.C.), and in La., (Garden City, S.C.), (Atlanta) or (Atlanta, Boca Raton, Fla. and Myrtle Beach, S.C.). “Pink Kiss” California Dreaming Carolina Roadhouse Chophouse ’47 Chophouse New Orleans Bon Ton Prime Rib Gulfstream Café Joey D’s Oak Room New York Prime CentraArchy dining guests are encouraged to share their photo-worthy Pink Kiss images on Facebook or Instagram using the hashtag #PinkKiss. For more information about CentraArchy Restaurants, visit . CentraArchy.com # # # New York Prime, Boca “Top Steakhouse” Thank you The Palm Beaches Florida for featuring us in and calling us ‘where classic steakhouse swagger meets Boca Raton.’ We’re proud to be your favorite #Boca steakhouse. ’10 Top Steak Houses in The Palm Beaches’ Read the full story Sizzling Bites: The Best Steakhouses in Palm Beach County You Need to try Now > New York Prime, Boca “Still the One” A huge thank you to for the amazing “Still the One” feature! We’re proud to keep raising the bar as your favorite #Boca steakhouse and grateful to our team and guests who make it all happen. Restaurants Restaurants Gift Cards Reservations Homepage News & Happenings Careers Contact ☰ x Restaurants Restaurants Gift Cards Reservations Homepage News & Happenings Careers Contact Watch Video Full Watch Video Full Our Restaurants In 1984, California Dreaming ‘The Restaurant and Bar at Union Station’ opened in Columbia, South Carolina. Since then, our company has grown to 15 unique restaurants under eight brands throughout the Southeast. Our menus focus on high-quality, fresh ingredients and house-made items that appeal to both casual and fine-dining guests. The teams at each location go to great lengths to ensure a dining experience that exceeds our guests’ expectations in every respect. The award-winning restaurants include: California Dreaming, New York Prime, Joey D’s Oak Room, Chophouse ’47, Carolina Roadhouse, Gulfstream Café, Bon Ton Prime Rib and Chophouse New Orleans.
